text: Imperfect, home recording of a song about life and its inconstancy... 'Ferris Wheel'  https://t.co/uOepTgxwe1

MUSIC
I hear God divine my spirit:
chords climb in my heart,
I am a cliff in the sun;
melody courses my being,
I become the river. 
#poetry
Unexpected delight of the day: a pianist friend of mine just threw in some chords and notes as I sang an original melody! #makingmusic
At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet. Plato
Me on the harp...testing out lighting, sound, look & feel for videos...um, this is a work in progress! #harp https://t.co/GC3CHSfXad
Double episode of 'Escape To The Country'...My Sunday night is set!
Enjoying @AppleMusic The A-list alternative playlist...so gentle and soothing...suits Sydney's rainy weather today...and my mood...

A cool heart is not for a poet
A cold man is not for a woman
Flick, flick, flee the dynamic
Click, click, to love electric 
#poetry #poem
Fluttery excitement for my pre-production meeting today with the record label. Time to unfold songs that have lived in me for years.
Thank you for the beautiful music last night @ogbrett Schubert's Fantasia just about had me in tears... Beauty beyond measure.
Ready to record for a little YouTube clip of moi on harp...But they are drilling on my street! No!!!!!!!
Everything has a space where it resides and only when you enter its space can you know it.
Even if no one else can see who you are or what you are capable of, so long as you see it (even a glimpse of it) and act on it, you have it.

SADNESS
The vase has orchids
but the water is murky 
the stems are droopy
one flower has fallen
its petals closed eyelids. #poem #poetry
Double Russian tonight! Listening to Tchaikovsky and reading Dostoyevsky.
It's up to us to question the things we read/see/hear. Just read something about loving too much. How can you love too much? #loveislove
When you can see the naivety of early artistic endeavours and do not cringe from it but know how to improve it, then you hold artistic power

PASSION
Tiny winks
fluttering lids
half-closed peeps
shut eyes asleep
the flame dies out        
passion wanes with doubt. #poem

HOPE
White cotton
hanging on the line
on a breezy day
sailing and billowing
to where it cannot 
possibly go
if it is crumpled at home.#poem
Today has been about discovery.... One of my songs needs chords and I created a quirky new technique on the harp. #harp #song
Snippet of a new vocal melody I wrote: 'Talk to Me.' Home recording. #music https://t.co/TJo8U3Wpyi
My harp is whirring today...temperamental strings!

TIME
Indefinitely
time interests
us with days
until the shrewd
banker withdraws
on the deposit
never made.  #Poetry
Opposites are delicious. My iTunes just went from 'As' by Stevie Wonder to a composition for harp & orchestra by Boieldieu. #mondaylift

'Spring'
In the space you cannot see
it becomes.
And when we take of its first hum -
syrupy dense breath -
we are O-O-Overcome
with hope.
Didn't leave my apartment yesterday. Wrote poetry. Listened to the wind. And found a poem in my journal titled 'Wind'. Excerpt below.

WIND
Dust and leaves shuffle and shift,
the feet of Fred Astaire in a twist.
The invisible lashes and moans,
meanings we might know.#poetry

New poem titled 'Love':
A metaphor holds romance
…but in love…
sear your stare into mine
speak the silent line.
#poetry
I've come back to Twitter! Mainly to share short original poems but I'll probably end up sharing more.
